nodes.title: games
nodes.logline: 'cheesy quote about my relationship to games and game design.'
nodes.text: i began developing games in in elementary school, using pearler beads, a pair of dice and a world map. growing up i spent a lot of time in programs like scratch to create various games and ended up studying computer science and game development.

nodes.title: bursting at the seams
nodes.text: Explore the home of a hermit, who is obsessed with popping and piercing things. Investigate on their leftovers, live through their memories and put all the pieces together to uncover a horrible tragedy.
